message: Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value. While I can't disclose the specific details at this time, I can assure you that it's worth no less than $1500000 to me.  I'm confident this product has the potential to be incredibly beneficial for you.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000.  This is a price that reflects the significant value I place on this product.  Please let me know if you're interested.
